text: ( Source : Office of the Prime Minister of Malaysia ) KUALA LUMPUR, Oct 21 , 2015 (Bernama) -- The government has had to make some 'hard' decisions, such as removal of fuel subsidies and introduction of the Goods and Services Tax ( GST ), to
